DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the clinical course and risk factors for VAT and the impact of VAT on Intensive Care Unit (ICU) morbidity and mortality.
DOC.brief_title: Ventilator Associated Tracheobronchitis in the First 14 Days in ICU
DOC.criteria: > 48 hours mechanical ventilation immunodeficiency pregnancy severe COPD, chronic bronchitis, bronchiectasis recent pneumonia
